title: Asian Lunar New Year Commemoration Week
context: [ยง8-4.6] Asian Lunar New Year Commemoration Week. The one week period following the day of the Chinese New Year shall be known and designated as the &ldquo;Asian Lunar New Year Week of Commemoration in Hawaii&rdquo;. This week is not and shall not be construed as a state holiday. [L 2007, c 48, ยง2]
